Package entities

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
entities.Booking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Booking extends Object implements Serializable
Represents bookings made by Customers Customer can have multiple bookings
Since:
2022-10-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jovan Sie

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(String bookingID, String userInfo, double totalPrice, String movie, int cinema, int cineplexID, ArrayList<Ticket> tt, LocalDateTime showtime, Transaction transaction)
      Constructer class for Booking Creates new Booking with necessary information
      Parameters:
      bookingID - booking ID of the current booking
      userInfo - userInfo contains email, mobile number and name of the user combined in a string
      totalPrice - total price of the tickets
      movie - title of the movie
      cinema - cinema number
      cineplexID - cineplex id
      tt - ticket array
      showtime - date and time of showtime
      transaction - transaction information
